title: Bizarre beauty: Shin Noguchi's everyday Japan – in pictures
text: Ginza, Tokyo, April 2014, from the series Sorry, You’ll Never Walk Alone Shin says: ‘In this project, I try to show a piece of Japan through unusual objects that people are carrying. Snapping something that really grabs the viewer is easier said than done. Just when I was thinking that the series needed more meaning, I ran into this woman: a mother and her twins in matching clothes on the upscale streets of Ginza, alone in a busy town. It was everything I wanted the project to be. In order to be adopted into society, people become a cog, leading their daily lives frantically’
description: From big-scramble zebra crossings to a man in a hedge, the award-winning street photographer revels in the life that swirls around him
